title: How to Follow a User on Yelp

steps.headline: Visit the Yelp webpage in your web browser.
Search for a user who has either posted a review or picture or something else on Yelp.
Click the business listing for the first place you've noticed where the person's name is displayed.
Locate the other reviews on the page.
steps.description: You'll most likely have to scroll down to view the remainder of them.

steps.headline: Click the "Follow this Reviewer" link that is just to the right of the review the person wrote.
Visit the Yelp webpage in your web browser.
Search for a user who has either posted a review or picture or something else on Yelp.
Click the business listing for the first place you've noticed where the person's name is displayed.
Locate the pictures area of the business page, and click one of the pictures.
steps.description: It should be just slightly to the right and underneath the business' name.

steps.headline: Scroll down until you see a full listing of all the pictures in a horizontal row, and click the person's name that appears below the smaller copy of the picture.
steps.description: You most-possibly won't have to scroll down very much, if at all (on most screens). This horizontal row will be just beneath the an increased-size picture that has displayed.

steps.headline: Locate and click the "Follow this Reviewer" link, which appears a few lines below this user's Yelp activities on the left-hand side of the page.
Accept the warning that you'll receive their reviews in a timely manner from the Following tab of your account (once you have logged in).

Accept the warning that you'll receive their reviews in a timely manner from the Following tab of your account (once you have logged in).
